pullrequest.title: issue #34 and add missing texture png files, changed ros packages to bsd

content.raw:
textures show up in rviz but not in gazebo (typical gazebo collada issue I guess? In rviz they do look really cool though :) ) - actually textures only show up in rviz when copying them into the mesh directory as it's looking in the same directory.

Jesper's version of r_uleg which is being used here has no textures.
content.html:
textures show up in rviz but not in gazebo (typical gazebo collada issue I guess? In rviz they do look really cool though :) ) - actually textures only show up in rviz when copying them into the mesh directory as it's looking in the same directory.

Jesper's version of r_uleg which is being used here has no textures.
